name: Healthy Chocolate Chip Peanut Butter Frozen Yogurt Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: banana, greek yogurt, peanut butter, mini dark chocolate chips
recipeIngredient: ½ cup mini dark chocolate chips
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine all ingredients except the chocolate chips into a food processor or high-speed blender, process until consistent color and completely smooth.
Pour into a pan. Mix into dark chocolate chips and smooth into an even layer.

Freeze 2 hours, or until frozen but still a little soft for scooping. (If freezing overnight, cover with a lid or plastic wrap, but let it sit out at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes before scooping).
Scoop into a bowl and top with your favorite toppings.
